website_summaries.verdict: A decent size refrigerator option that offers plenty of space for keeping food cool.
pros: Lots of interior space for keeping cold food fresh
No freezer means more storage space for refrigerator items
Does not make a lot of noise when operating
cons: The temperature on this fridge can get a little too cold at times

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the reviewers that say this is noisy. There is a simple fix - make sure it is level. Mine started making noise, and I checked it, and it was not level. A quick level job, and you would never know it was plugged in. For those just looking for a fridge for drinks, this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with unit so far.....
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and arrived with NO damage. Not even a scratch. Unpacked, plugged in and works great so far. Runs very quiet. Learned over the years to place a rubber mat or carpet under any appliance will cut down on noise. As unit was placed on wood, placed piece of carpet under unit and can hardly hear it run. Did not need a freezer, so very much appreciate the extra room for refrigerator. Regards, Gil Alligood
customer_reviews.author: G. Alligood

customer_reviews.title: Great little Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality mini fridge. The unit is very quiet, cools very well very quickly, and is nicely laid out inside. I have had zero issues with this unit and would happily purchase it again. If you are going to build it into a cabinet like I did, be sure to leave at least a 4 inch gap behind it and a minimum one inch gap on top so it can breath. This will prevent the unit from overheating helping insure years of use.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Neither environment is recommended for this refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because I have only had it on for 1 month. I have it under a counter in a covered outdoor kitchen. Neither environment is recommended for this refrigerator, so I don't know how long it will last. I use it only for beer and soft drinks and it does the job. I like the absence of a freezer section I don't need. Looks great, quiet and cold. Plenty of room for my needs. 5 stars if it lasts 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: HarryK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I set mine on a rubber welcome mat up on a small table in my office at work and keep my food in it. You cannot hear it run and it keeps food fresh and cold very well. It's really nice and perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J.

customer_reviews.title: A good little fridge for a dorm room
customer_reviews.text: A good little fridge for a dorm room. Can take some time to cool things, but we had to set it to about 3 because any higher and our drinks would freeze.
customer_reviews.author: K. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Realizing what it is.  Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Received 1st week December 2018. First off. I left the refrigerator set upright for a week prior to unpacking or powering up. (Did not trust shipper (FEDEX) maintaining an upright position.) I was equipt with a refrigerator thermometer and set the thermostat on 6.5. Unpacked, leveled and powered up with the thermometer on the center shelf. Allowed unit to cycle overnight. Checked internal temp the next day to be 38 degrees Fahrenheit. Placed additional items being careful to not crowd shelf adjacent to the thermostat. Verified daily and weekly thereafter. 38 degrees has been maintained to date of this post. Space between the back of refrigerator and wall, 6". Internal temperature does rise quickly if door open more than briefly.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_B

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - rattles - avoid
customer_reviews.text: I read through the other reviews -- some units really do have compressor units that hum/rattle (because the fan inside rubs up against the casing). Leveling it is important. The one we got has to be tipped forward by 10° to stop the rattling. There's no way to adjust the condenser to stop the rattling either (short of presumably taking the motor/fan assembly apart and rebuilding it). At $140, it's not worth shipping back; and the repair options aren't so great.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refrigerator to use in garage for water, soda, beer etc. Works very well with lots of storage. This mini fridge does not have freezer which is perfect for my needs. Refrigerator runs quietly, appears to be energy efficient. My main problem is the fridge arrived missing a leveler leg. I contacted Magic Chef and they said they would send one out but it was out of stock. I used a shim for a temporary fix but I find it odd that part is not available, tells me I am not alone. Poor quality control. Three weeks later still no part, again told it is on back order which is equivalent to check is in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: Received the Magic Chef refrigerator yesterday, first, the bottom of the box was only held in place by 2 plastic straps that were tightly secured but would not make it very easy to send the unit back if needed? There were multiple dents on both back corners and on one side. The manual provided gave great directions on how to change the door opening from left to right, the problem was when making the change I found the unit was not drilled to actually make that change. I used self tapping metal screw which worked well. The unit cooled down fast and as it will be used in a garage I guess I can put up with the dents.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Everything works fine with the exception of a ding in the side ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine with the exception of a ding in the side of the door, I am quite happy. Interior fits all that I wish to cool in it and much more useful than units with the small freezer taking up space. After I had installed in the garage I found a note in the manual that stated "Not for the garage". Don't know why but we'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Spike

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great little fridge for keeping drinks cold! Has shelves and places in the door to store any kind of drinks! We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great If Your Deaf
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is frost-free, but the darn thing is just too loud. I've had it for a couple months now and the compressor hum is oppressive. Great fridge for deaf people.
customer_reviews.author: FlashHack

customer_reviews.title: good thing I had a spare that fit and door ...
customer_reviews.text: Let it sit for 24 hours before plugging it in......works perfectly; had a problem with the lower door hinge as one screw was missing; good thing I had a spare that fit and door swings and shuts with not problem.....nice cold temperature between 4-5 setting; so quiet, only knows that it had been on when it turns off and there is a whisper of the compressor shutting down. This compact refrigerator has a lot of space for all my food, drinks, condiments, snacks, fruit, etc. Love it; thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Macatiag Jr

customer_reviews.title: The perfect kegerator!
customer_reviews.text: So this thing makes the perfect affordable kegerator. There’s no freezer and no coils on the top, making it easy to drill your hole right through the top. Turning it into a kegerator is going to take some work. You are going to have to cut most of the plastic off the door and scoop out most of the insulation. Leave just enough to cover the inside of the door. A 1/4 keg and 5lb co2 tank will fit inside. It holds the temperature perfectly as well. Works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fridge
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and large. This fridge is huge. Has 3 adjustable shelves which can accommodate almost anything. It will hold my breakfast, lunch, snacks, and tons of drinks. Love the produce drawer which prevents my fruit from rolling out. Has a little section to hold my condiments in place. Came assembled and also came with anything necessary to change the direction the door opens, which I did not have to do. Holds a microwave on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This fridge has been a wonderful addition to my office. It’s quiet and keeps all my items cold.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Kingren

customer_reviews.title: Fridge is nice
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked the reviews and feedback. The fridge is very nice but had a quarter inch dent in the side as pictured. The box wasn't damaged and neither was the Styrofoam surrounding the item (it is well packed!!) so this happened at the factory. I held a chat session with Amazon and they offered a discount for the issue and we took that since it was out of stock and my hubby (who this is for) is less OCD about perfection than I am. Rated 4 for Magic Chef. Amazon gets a 5 star review from me!
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dorm room fridge
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Dorm room fridge. Was delivered in great condition and cools very well. Love that it does not have a freezer. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: DMB2H

customer_reviews.title: Like the frost Free design
customer_reviews.text: Like the frost Free design. Also lower height got it under my std countertop. Light inside is also nice. Way more space inside than old one which was Demoted to garage as a nightcrawler storage box. (Love them Walleye.)
customer_reviews.author: Dave Alan

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed smaller refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than the box stores typical dorm room fridge - interior planing well designed to make the most out of storage. Nice size for use in a covered pool house to keep The kids from running in and out for cold drinks . Also great as extra fridge storage for cold drinks, beer etc during The holidays when space is so precious!
customer_reviews.author: Zilla62

customer_reviews.title: Terrible temp control
customer_reviews.text: Every part of the fridge registers a different temperature. At setting "4", the top compartment is at 42 degrees while the bottom is at 50. At setting "5" it freezes everything in the fridge. I regret not having sent this back soon after receiving it...
customer_reviews.author: Hotbones

customer_reviews.title: If I had to do this over again, I would choose a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of condensation appears on the back inside of the fridge -- sometimes it's frozen. I should have returned it, but it is for my sister who is in a nursing home, and the logistics of returning it were too complicated for me.
customer_reviews.author: martelpa

customer_reviews.title: perfect fro office
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled to have the new refrigerator in the office. The soda can rack is a great enhancement and the black front panel is pleasing to the eye. the delivery time was quick and we are a happy group. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Louise M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my kitchen fridge. I have three freezers, so I just needed a little space for small items. This one works really well, everything is the tempeture that it should be. Besides a bit of condensation( why it gets a 4 instead of 5) on the back wall. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Felieke

customer_reviews.title: Reliability?
customer_reviews.text: Died after 3 months?! Out of nowhere! Extremely disappointed as it was a birthday gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Santangelo

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Service & refrigerator. I could not believe how quickly my item arrived. It was well packed without extra unnecessary stuffing. Arrived in pristine condition & is an awesome little work horse. Don’t hesitate if you are looking for a roomy, quality, no frost mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Aversano

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a great product for the price. We have only use it for alcoholic beverages and mixers so I can’t say how it does for food just yet. Overall we are very pleased with our purchase and would definitely recommend for your mini bar or man cave!
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice - moderate shipping damage however...
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday, works fine - can't speak to the longtime durability or functionality itself. Unfortunately it contained some extensive "handling" damage on the back corner - however Amazon offered goodwill to make it right. Way to go...hope it lasts awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Reno the Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived With Broke Bottom Hinge
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a broke bottom hinge. Registered product and now trying to get part to repair the product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works great. It is very easy to move around. It keeps our food nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: PollockPR

customer_reviews.title: Delivered 3 days early. 😀
customer_reviews.text: Just received my fridge today, 3 days prior to estimated delivery date. Easy to unpackage and no visible damage. So far it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R Reagan

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my office for a month, and it is working great. It is not too loud, keeps the food cold, and doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not too loud. No freezer, so I have added storage space that I actually need. Shipped fine, no damage to the box. I'm very happy to have my own little fridge that works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN ST. ISLE

customer_reviews.title: Mishandling of product
customer_reviews.text: The frig so far works pretty good. It did have at least 4 dents in it, one in the right hand back corner on top that is pretty significant. Too much of a problem to send back. I doubt i will order another appliance online.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M. Crown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect garage refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a full size refrigerator in my garage with this one. It’s perfect for our beer, soda and wine. It also saves me around 5.00 a month over the old one. That’s 60.00/yr in electric savings
customer_reviews.author: MasterVernon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: How to hang up with the first delivery it was corrected by the seller works pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Dona C

customer_reviews.title: Nice Purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far it is doing what it is suppose to do. No Complaints
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a nice unit, but like many other reviewers, mine is missing parts. Quality control at Magic Chef sucks, the leveler legs were missing. How do they expect you to level the unit, without the legs! I am currently on a 30 minute hold with parts, I am first in line and still no answer, Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Magic chef refrigerater
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my enclosed deck & use it for water and sodas (freeing up space in my refrigerator) I ordered without the freezer, it takes up to much space & I didn't need it anyway. It runs so quietly you don't even know it's running. Also love the light, my old one didn't have one. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Came dented, but works
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine. Packaging was clean and not banged up at all yet the fridge inside (2 boxes, surrounded by styrofoam) has a decent size dent in the side.
customer_reviews.author: Domenique

customer_reviews.title: Don’t put setting to high. Stuff will freeze
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fridge. Pretty quiet. Keeps things cold. My husband loves it. We use it in the theater room up stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene DeStratis

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Problem with fridge making noise and some bottles and cans are freezing, not sure good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bettye J. Walling

customer_reviews.title: Great standing fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great standing fridge. Works great. No freezer section so no defrosting. Would like to have my beverages a bit colder. This seems to be an issue with small refrigerators.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie4me

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted a small fridge for my home bar. After looking at quite a few, decided on this. So far so good, keeps the beer cold
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. A. O'neill

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, but shipping caused cosmetic damage
customer_reviews.text: Great fridge for the price. Works exactly as it should. Very easy to take out of package and plug in immediately. However, when I unboxed the fridge there were two small dents on it.
customer_reviews.author: showmeyourface

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged on the outside but doesn’t get cold enough. Rather than ship it back I donated it to Goodwill
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Barakat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Really like how it was shipped and that it is all refrigerator and didn't come with time freezer portion. Lots of room inside.
customer_reviews.author: tmarie

customer_reviews.title: No Freezer
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of this size refrigerator. This is the best because there is no freezer. That leaves a lot more room for groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fridge! Perfect size for my office. I hardly know it's there. No noise. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce R

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great refridgerator if you don’t need a freezer and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom and she says she loves it! It’s so roomy and it has a light! It’s a great refridgerator if you don’t need a freezer and it does a great job keeping food cool
customer_reviews.author: A.CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Dented in the corner
customer_reviews.text: The box was intact but the refrigerator had a smashed in corner. It worked fine and I kept it because my college student was leaving and I didnt have time to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Lots of room inside.
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Love that it has no freezer. Perfect for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, not too big and plenty of space ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, not too big and plenty of space inside. I recommend to anyone looking for a small apartment a refrigerator that's not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Goodine

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Works as advertised. Very happy with the purchase. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my son and his girlfriend. Heck with a freezer. Just wasted space and de-ice baloney if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best mini Fridge Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This model is so quiet I have never even heard it, and it's right beside my bed! I accidentally turned the temp down too low in the beginning and actually got some frozen water bottles. Yowza!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mini fridge. Lots of space. Don’t turn the temperature gauge up too much or your food may get ice crystals.
customer_reviews.author: JaneJones

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wanted all refrigerated space with no little freezer and this is great.....
customer_reviews.author: finn57

customer_reviews.title: Love no freezer.
customer_reviews.text: Love the space. Did not want a freezer. It's quiet and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Harry

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Cooling
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 2 years and now it barely cools below room temperature. I'm not sure what's wrong with it because I'm not repairman, but 2 years is a very short lifespan for a fridge. It was good while it lasted, but not worth the money for breaking prematurely.
customer_reviews.author: Anon489914

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my office and it's fantastic. Our old one had a manual freezer and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my office and it's fantastic. Our old one had a manual freezer and it was an ordeal every time we had to defrost it! This one has no freezer and it's perfect. Only draw back is that the bottom rack on the door does not give you a lot of room for water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: KWells

customer_reviews.title: Magic Chef
customer_reviews.text: Does not get as cold as I would like, bought for beverages
customer_reviews.author: Deborah McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fridge. Cools nicely and keeps beverages cold. Does not make noise or vibrate. Great purchase. Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job for cold beverages for meetings at work.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Brazel

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds a lot. I dislike that it was dented. I dislike that moisture builds up on the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bon Jovi

customer_reviews.title: Badly Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The day I opened the box I was disappointed, product was dented and the door hinge was bent plastic pieces were cracked or broken
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Fridge arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Was able to unbox and plug in within minutes :-) Fridge is cold and good to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Perfect size for our office
customer_reviews.text: Other fridge quit unexpectedly. This was delivered quickly and right to our door. Good quality. Perfect size for our office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and works well for our needs. I really like that it is frost free.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Fleet

customer_reviews.title: All refrigerator no freezer
customer_reviews.text: Great product wanted one with out a freezer compartment . Easy to set up arrived two days earlier than forecast .
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Holland

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator only-no freezer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a refrigerator with no freezer compartment. This was the only one I found.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It is uneven
customer_reviews.text: The fridge is uneven- I use the manual to level it off- I don't feel like going through the hassle of returning it- so I use the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Not suitable for food
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get any colder than about 50 degrees, which is not safe for food. This is my SECOND one of these. The first one did not cool properly, and Amazon kindly replaced it. Now the second one is the exact same thing: thermostat turned almost all the way down and inside is 50 degrees. This must be a very old or defective batch of refrigerators being sold.
customer_reviews.author: bubblefarmer

customer_reviews.title: Freeeedge
customer_reviews.text: Lit for janks good amount of space in dat jaunt
customer_reviews.author: Bruhdude7

customer_reviews.title: Dents
customer_reviews.text: I received. My Magic Chef refrigerator 2 day ago and it was all I expected it to be, so far! One problem: Two dents in the door! The dents weren’t very large but on a black surface, they really show up. The problem kind of ruined the feeling of getting something new and setting it up without harboring a feeling of disappointment. Too much of a problem to return so I’ll learn to live with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: the refrigerator is very nice, I like it. spacious inside, fits a lot, cooling is good, does not make ice , came with a bump on the top back right corner, tried to put a claim but was not processed" apparently they never received my picture. Where the fridge is at nobody cant see the damage corner so I desist of the claim.
customer_reviews.author: cover

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in very poor condition. You’re taking your chances when ordering a ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in very poor condition. You’re taking your chances when ordering a refrigerator on line. Sent it back in a heartbeat. You’ll have more fun flushing a handful of money down the toilet. Total waste of my time and energy. It’s your decision. Lots of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Brainiac

customer_reviews.title: Good price.....but....
customer_reviews.text: This is second Magic Chef small storage fridge I have purchased in the last 5 years. This little fridge works well and for the price it is fine. Very flimsy and cheap plastic inserts. These days I need my purchases to last....not sure if this will last as long as the first little fridge that fizzled out after 4 years. Am hoping to be wrong in my assumption!!! Will not buy another fridge from Magic Chef.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator did not work-right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Refrigerator did not work, right out of the box. Compressor did not turn on and it does not cool. Now I have the trouble of returning it. I will never buy another Magic Chef product again
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Tracking shows an entry where the merchandise had been re-routed ...
customer_reviews.text: Tracking shows an entry where the merchandise had been re-routed after a change request from customer. THAT IS NONSENSE We never changed anything
customer_reviews.author: Adi "Oberst"

customer_reviews.title: All fridge, no freeer!
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is perfect for our small office kitchen because it has no freezer. More space for lunches and snacks without the aggravation of having to defrost the freezer that nobody ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Pchlee

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when we were going to be without our fridge when our kitchen was being renovated. It held much more than I expected...maybe because it does not have a freezer. We didn't need the freezer since we have a free standing one in our basement...so this was perfect for our needs. We will move it into our basement for extra storage when we are able to use our new fridge. For the price, it had much more space than the little cube fridges out there.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Pron

product_meta.title: Magic Chef MCAR320B2 All Refrigerator, 3.2 cu.ft, Black
product_meta.description: The Magic Chef 3.2 cu. ft. compact all-refrigerator has the fresh-food storage options you're looking for whether you're college-bound or simply want a little extra refrigerator space in your home or office. Offering plenty of additional space for storing your favorite beverages and refrigerated snacks, this unit has interior lighting, two removable glass shelves, crisper drawer with cover, and 12-oz. beverage can dispenser to keep you organized. Plus, the reversible door and flush-back design provides additional flexibility in placement.
feature_bullets: 3.2 Cu. Ft. capacity. Dimensions Width 18.7 inches ,Height 33.4 inches ,Depth 17.5 inches
Black door / Black cabinet/ Glass Shelves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars150 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
